# Minesweeper

**Toy app built with Electron**

## Building

``` npm install electron-prebuilt --save-dev ```
``` npm install ```
``` ./node_modules/electron-packager/cli.js .  --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --ignore=.git  --overwrite --icon=images/icon.icns --out=dist ```
